name: BadMirror
0:
”Alexa, open bad mirror”
”Alexa, ask bad mirror who's the baddest of them all”
”Alexa, ask bad mirror how bad am I”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bad mirror
des: Kind of like the favorite childhood quote, "Mirror, mirror on the wall", you can ask Alexa "who is the baddest of them all", and she'll give you an answer I'm sure you'll like! Try it when you wake up, before bed, or just prove your friends wrong!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
